keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The court found four of the men guilty of violating Indonesia’s antiterrorism law. This is the first time Indonesia has sent anyone to prison for links to the group.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Indonesia: 7 Men Are Convicted of Ties to Islamic State
headline.main: Indonesia: 7 Men Are Convicted of Ties to Islamic State

snippet: The court found four of the men guilty of violating Indonesia’s antiterrorism law. This is the first time Indonesia has sent anyone to prison for links to the group.
abstract: Indonesian court finds seven men guilty for conspiring with Islamic State group, violating anti-terrorism laws; ruling marks first time Indonesia has convicted anyone with ties to group.
